titleStmt.title: His Majesties letter to the lord keeper. Together with his message to both Houses of Parliament, in answer to their petition concerning the militia, Feb. 28. 1641. Declaring the reasons why his Majestie doth not conceive himself obliged by any promise formerly made, to yeeld to the same.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Franke, and are to be sold at his shop next doore to the Kings head in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
